REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0733 reute r f BC-HERITAGE-<HHH>-SAYS-M 03-13 0057

TEXT.TITLE: HERITAGE <HHH> SAYS MOST WARRANTS EXERCISED
TEXT.BODY: Heritage Entertainment Inc said 419,867 of its 745,976 warrants were exercised at the reduced price of 3.75 dlrs a share under an offer that expired March 12. The company said the exercise price will now be 4.50 dlrs a share though the end of 1987 and five dlrs for 1988. Reuter
